text: Dropgun is a Russian DJ and production duo from Tomsk, formed in 2013. The group is best known for their collaboration with Dvbbs in the single "Pyramids" in 2014. The single reached 39th place on the Belgian charts. ==Discography== === Charting singles === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ ! scope="col" rowspan="2" Prophecy recordings discography === In March 2020, Dropgun launched their own record label - Prophecy - as a sublabel of Don Diablo's Hexagon label, as part of the label's expansion, which also included the launch of sublabels run by King Arthur, RetroVision and JLV. * 2020: Dropgun - Annihilation * 2020: Savage Kids & Lørean - Dark Side * 2020: Dropgun - Chicken Run * 2020: Gosha - Get Busy
